attributes.title: Episode 1: Prologue
attributes.caption: Season 15 of Red vs. Blue kicks off with a bang. In the wake of a violent assault on a UNSC supply depot, one reporter (Dylan Andrews) is determined to find out the true motivations of its colorful attackers: a villainous gang known as the Reds and Blues.
attributes.description: Season 15 of Red vs. Blue kicks off with a bang. In the wake of a violent assault on a UNSC supply depot, one reporter (Dylan Andrews) is determined to find out the true motivations of its colorful attackers: a villainous gang known as the Reds and Blues.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 2: The Chronicle
attributes.caption: IDA Reporter Dylan Andrews begins her search for the Reds and Blues in Blood Gulch Canyon with the help of a new cameraman.
attributes.description: IDA Reporter Dylan Andrews begins her search for the Reds and Blues in Blood Gulch Canyon with the help of a new cameraman.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 3: The Mother of Destruction
attributes.caption: The search for the Reds and Blues takes Dylan and Jax to the crashed remains of Project Freelancer. While Dylan struggles to justify her continuing search against a lack of progress, a break in the story finally comes in unexpected visitors.
attributes.description: The search for the Reds and Blues takes Dylan and Jax to the crashed remains of Project Freelancer. While Dylan struggles to justify her continuing search against a lack of progress, a break in the story finally comes in unexpected visitors.
attributes.display_title: S15:E3 - Episode 3: The Mother of Destruction
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 4: Chorus Lessons
attributes.caption: Dylan’s search concludes on the Planet Chorus, the last known hang out of the Reds and Blues before they vanished and embarked on a galactic crime spree.
attributes.description: Dylan's search concludes on the Planet Chorus, the last known hang out of the Reds and Blues before they vanished and embarked on a galactic crime spree. Stonewalled by an administration that doesn't trust the press, Dylan finds herself going to extreme measures to gain access to Chorus' important figures.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 5: Previously On
attributes.caption: Investigative Journalist Dylan Andrews sits down with the notorious Reds and Blues to finally hear the full story of their actions since Chorus.
attributes.description: Investigative Journalist Dylan Andrews sits down with the notorious Reds and Blues to finally hear the full story of their actions since Chorus.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 6: Reacts
attributes.caption: The message sent by Kimbal spurs the Reds and Blues into immediate action. Tucker and Caboose leap to the rescue, while Carolina and Washington urge caution and patience. Meanwhile, Red Team gets weird.
attributes.description: The message sent by Kimbal spurs the Reds and Blues into immediate action. Tucker and Caboose leap to the rescue, while Carolina and Washington urge caution and patience. Meanwhile, Red Team gets weird.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 7: Nightmare on Planet Evil
attributes.caption: On the search for Church, the Reds and Blues face their deepest fears in a haunted city.
attributes.description: On the search for Church, the Reds and Blues face their deepest fears in a haunted city.
attributes.display_title: S15:E7 - Episode 7: Nightmare on Planet Evil
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 8: A Fistful of Colours
attributes.caption: It’s all been leading to this. On a desert planet in the middle of nowhere, the Reds and Blues find themselves face to face with the truth of their colorful imposters. The truth is revealed, and it's something they never saw coming.
attributes.description: It's all been leading to this. On a desert planet in the middle of nowhere, the Reds and Blues find themselves face to face with the truth of their colorful imposters. The truth is revealed, and it's something they never saw coming.
attributes.display_title: S15:E8 - Episode 8: A Fistful of Colours
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 9: Rigged
attributes.caption: The Reds and Blues get to know the Blues and Reds better, and discover a familier face among their ranks.
attributes.description: The Reds and Blues get to know the Blues and Reds better, and discover a familier face among their ranks.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 10: Battlescars
attributes.caption: Agents Carolina and Washington have successfully followed the trail of missing Freelancers to the beach house of an former associate, Agent Illinois.
attributes.description: Agents Carolina and Washington have successfully followed the trail of missing Freelancers to the beach house of an former associate, Agent Illinois. While digging through their past hasn't yielded any revelations, it has managed to reopen old wounds for Carolina.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 11: Belly of the Beast
attributes.caption: Blocked by the Reds and Blues, Dylan decides to try and seek answers on her own. Sarge finally gets a shot at stardom.
attributes.description: Blocked by the Reds and Blues, Dylan decides to try and seek answers on her own. Sarge finally gets a shot at stardom.
attributes.display_title: S15:E11 - Episode 11: Belly of the Beast
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 12: Blue vs. Red
attributes.caption: In a box canyon in the middle of nowhere, two teams are locked in stalemate over a game of capture the flag. This is Blue vs Red, the Desert Gulch Chronicles.
attributes.description: In a box canyon in the middle of nowhere, two teams are locked in stalemate over a game of capture the flag. This is Blue vs Red, the Desert Gulch Chronicles.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 13: Blue vs. Red - Part 2
attributes.caption: A pair of Freelancers break the stalemate in the action-packed finale of the Desert Gulch Chronicles.
attributes.description: A pair of Freelancers break the stalemate in the action-packed finale of the Desert Gulch Chronicles.
attributes.display_title: S15:E13 - Episode 13: Blue vs. Red - Part 2
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 14: True Colors
attributes.caption: The Reds and Blues begin to suspect their colorful counterparts of sinister designs.
attributes.description: The Reds and Blues begin to suspect their colorful counterparts of sinister designs.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 15: Objects in Space
attributes.caption: With the fate of the Reds and Blues hanging in the balance, one robot boldly goes where no one has gone before.
attributes.description: With the fate of the Reds and Blues hanging in the balance, one robot boldly goes where no one has gone before.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 16: Grif Does a Rescue
attributes.caption: Sarge finally gets his wish as the Blues and Reds deal with an unexpected intruder. The gang learns the hard truth about a lost teamate.
attributes.description: Sarge finally gets his wish as the Blues and Reds deal with an unexpected intruder. The gang learns the hard truth about a lost teamate.
attributes.display_title: S15:E16 - Episode 16: Grif Does a Rescue
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 17: Quicksave
attributes.caption: Free from their confinement; Carolina, Washington and Locus make plans for the gang's escape. Sarge struggles with difficult orders.
attributes.description: Free from their confinement; Carolina, Washington and Locus make plans for the gang's escape. Sarge struggles with difficult orders.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 18: Desolation
attributes.caption: The Reds and Blues are shaken in the aftermath of their daring escape. Dylan phones a friend for answers about Loco's crazy machine.
attributes.description: The Reds and Blues are shaken in the aftermath of their daring escape. Dylan phones a friend for answers about Loco's crazy machine.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 19: Red vs Red
attributes.caption: It's all out war between the Reds and Blues and their evil counterpartss. The gang must overcome terrible odds to stop Temple before it's too late.
attributes.description: It's all out war between the Reds and Blues and their evil counterpartss. The gang must overcome terrible odds to stop Temple before it's too late.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 20: Blue vs Blue
attributes.caption: It’s Red vs. Red and Blue vs. Blue in the action-packed penultimate episode of Season 15. Temple is on the verge of accomplishing his synister goals and there is only one group of primary-colored soldiers who can stop him.
attributes.description: It's Red vs. Red and Blue vs. Blue in the action-packed penultimate episode of Season 15. Temple is on the verge of accomplishing his synister goals and there is only one group of primary-colored soldiers who can stop him.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy

attributes.title: Episode 21: Epilogues
attributes.caption: Season 15 concludes with a mysterious visit from an old friend. Dylan finds her ending.
attributes.description: Season 15 concludes with a mysterious visit from an old friend. Dylan finds her ending.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: The Shisno Trilogy
